cause.description:
Team In Training® (TNT) is the world's largest endurance sports training program, allowing each athlete to run, walk or ride in honor of a patient with leukemia, lymphoma or myeloma.
I am training to participate in the LaSalle Bank Chicago Marathon on October 7, 2007. Please help me raise $5,000 to benefit blood cancer surviors.
Please visit my TNT sponsored webpage and donate to support The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society. www.active.com/donate/tntnonj/dfrancis
1. It only takes one person to make a difference. Help me make a difference in the world
cause.mission: Cure leukemia, lymphoma, Hodgkin's disease and myeloma, and improve the quality of life of patients and their families.
cause.name: The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society Team in Training
